articles.author: Gabriel Manceau
articles.title: Test des Samsung Galaxy S24 et S24 Plus : plus petits, plus endurants et moins chers
articles.description: Présentés aux côtés du Galaxy S24 Ultra, les Galaxy S24 et S24+ ont de sérieux atouts à faire valoir, comme un format compact, une autonomie XXL et un prix plus doux que leur grand frère. On décortique tout ça dans ce test complet.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Ex-CIA software engineer who leaked to WikiLeaks sentenced to 40 years
articles.description: Joshua Schulte had been found guilty of handing over classified materials in so-called Vault 7 leak.
articles.content:
A former CIA software engineer has been sentenced to 40 years in prison for leaking classified information and possessing child sexual abuse material.

articles.title: Apple Vision Pro now available
articles.description: Apple's Vision Pro headset is finally available, having wrapped-up its pre-order campaign. It comes in three storage versions - 256GB, 512GB and 1TB. The starting price is $3,499, while the 512GB and 1TB flavors are selling for $3,699 and $3,899, respectively…
